options.name: Marksman
options.description: Gain +1 Attack with Ranged and Heavy Ranged Weapons. Your effective range with these weapons is increased by 2 units.

options.name: Action : Aimed Shot
options.description: Take careful aim at a target. Your next Ranged or Heavy Ranged attack before the end of your next turn has a +1d4 Attack bonus and deals +1d4 damage.

options.name: Steady Hands
options.description: You ignore the first level of penalties from difficult conditions (weather, visibility, movement) when making Ranged attacks.

options.name: Vital Shot
options.description: Your Critical Hit threshold with Ranged and Heavy Ranged Weapons is improved by 1, and critical hits deal an additional 1d6 damage.

options.name: Action : Suppressive Fire
options.description: Fire a barrage of shots to suppress enemies. All enemies in a 3x3 area within range must make a Dodge check or be unable to move from their position until the start of your next turn.

options.name: Long Shot
options.description: Your Ranged and Heavy Ranged Weapon attacks no longer suffer range penalties and gain +1 damage.

options.name: Reaction : Covering Fire
options.description: When an ally within 10 units is targeted by an enemy attack, you can make a Ranged or Heavy Ranged Weapon attack against that enemy. If you hit, the enemy's attack has a 1d4 penalty.

options.name: Action : Disarming Shot
options.description: Make a Ranged or Heavy Ranged Weapon attack with a 1d4 penalty. If the attack hits, the target must succeed on a Strength check or drop one item they're holding.

options.name: Master Marksman
options.description: Once per turn when you hit with a Ranged or Heavy Ranged Weapon, you can choose to deal maximum damage instead of rolling dice. Additionally, gain +1 Attack with Ranged and Heavy Ranged Weapons.
